title: Senior IT-arkitekt
description:
**Uppdragsbeskrivning:**
 Som IT-arkitekt kommer du att planera och leda arkitekturarbetet inom initiativ relaterade till Mobility. Detta innebär att identifiera affärsbehov, producera och bryta ner lösningsdesign till epics, features, och user stories. Du kommer också att ansvara för att samordna prioriteringar och omfång med utvecklingsgrupper samt delta i "big room planning". Ett av våra nuvarande fokusområden är att förbättra vår fakturering, så erfarenhet inom detta område är en fördel.
   

  

**Kompetenskrav:**
* Stark förståelse för lösningsarkitektur
* Strategiskt tänkesätt
* Förmåga att bygga och upprätthålla relationer
* Erfarenhet av att planera och leda arkitekturarbete
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med epics, features och user stories
* Förmåga att arbeta i tvärfunktionella team
* Erfarenhet från faktureringsdomänen (meriterande)
* Kommunicerar obehindrat i på Svenska och Engelska i tal och skrift


**Omfattning: 100%**
**Språk: Svenska**
**Vänligen ansök snarast med:**
* Ditt uppdaterade CV
* Timpris (inkl. omkostnader)
* Tillgänglighetsdatum
* En kort motivering varför du är lämplig uppdraget.

title: IT Upphandlingskonsult
description:
***Vår vision är "Sveriges ledande upphandlingskonsulter som driver
   

  

 digital transformation, hållbarhet och verksamhetsutveckling."***
***Vi tillhandahåller expertkunskap inom hela upphandlingsområdet i form av kompetenta upphandlingsprojektledare, kravanalytiker, inköpsutvecklare och upphandlingsjurister. Vi är med genom hela inköpsprocessen från analys av verksamhetsbehov, strategiska vägval, genomförande och införande.***
 Som IT-Upphandlingskonsult hos oss kommer du att vara med i B3 leverans till offentlig sektor och du kommer att få en viktig roll med stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets och din egen utveckling. Vi är en liten organisation som är del av B3 Consulting Group vilket gör att vi får det bästa av två världar, en platt organisation med härlig kultur som är en del av en stor koncern med bred kompetens och många års gedigen erfarenhet inom IT och Management.
   

  

**Rollen**
 I rollen som Upphandlingskonsult hjälper du våra kunder att genomföra komplexa och omfattande IT-upphandlingar. Du arbetar antingen på egen hand eller tillsammans med specialister från våra andra dotterbolag inom B3 koncernen. Hos oss kommer du alltid att ha ett nätverk av riktigt kompetenta kollegor att utbyta erfarenheter med!
   

  

 Rollen innefattar en rad olika arbetsuppgifter, som exempelvis:
   

  

* Utredningar och analyser av kunders inköpsprocesser och inköpsorganisationer
* Strategisk rådgivning i inköpsprocessen, som exempelvis att välja strategi och upphandlingsform
* Hjälpa våra kunder genom hela upphandlingsprocessen
* Kvalitetssäkring av Upphandlingsdokumentation och avtal
* Utveckling och förnyelse av den offentliga verksamheten


**Kvalifikationer**
* Vi tror att du har 4+ års erfarenhet i rollen som IT-Upphandlare/Upphandlingskonsult med ansvar för genomförandet av komplexa upphandlingar enligt LOU/LUF
* Erfarenhet från stora upphandlande myndigheter är meriterande men inget krav


 B3 Upphandling är en del av B3 koncernen. Vi prioriterar frihet och balans i livet och har vunnit priser för vårt wellnesskoncept. Vi tror på att medarbetare som mår bra, presterar bättre och satsar därför stort på att bygga en varm, kreativ och öppen kultur i bolaget. Vi gillar att hitta på saker och arrangerar löpande olika aktiviteter, allt från cross fit till musikquiz.
   

  

 Hållbarhet är också ett ledord för oss på B3 och det gäller såväl våra sociala initiativ, som hur vi jobbar med vår viktigaste tillgång – våra medarbetare. B3 fungerar som en bas för våra konsulter där de finner stöd och får möjligheter att umgås, lära sig nya saker och bygga på kunskap.
   

  

 B3 är utsedd av Great Place to work till en av Europas bästa arbetsplatser och Sveriges bästa arbetsplats inom kategorin Large Workplaces.

title: DevOps teamlead
description:
Vår kund är en världsledande aktör inom avancerad sensorteknik och söker nu en erfaren och engagerad DevOps-utvecklare som även tar rollen som Team Lead för DevOps-teamet inom Embedded Systems-avdelningen.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 DevOps-teamet består i dag av tre personer och ansvarar för att utveckla och underhålla kundens verktyg och system för mjukvaruproduktion. Fokus ligger på både Linux- och Androidbaserad utveckling. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att vidareutveckla DevOps-miljön och fungera som en länk mellan interna utvecklingsteam och global IT.
   

  

 Som Team Lead har du det övergripande ansvaret för att planera, prioritera och driva arbetet i DevOps-teamet samt kommunicera med stakeholders inom och utanför organisationen. Tjänsten innebär även ett visst driftansvar för interna systemmiljöer.
   

  

**Organisationen Består Av Två Huvudenheter**
* Embedded Systems: OS (14 personer) och SW Test (3 personer)
* Embedded Applications: Middleware (11 personer) och UI (4 personer)


 Utvecklingsteamen arbetar tätt tillsammans i projektform där resurser från olika discipliner samarbetar.
   

  

**Din bakgrund**
 Vi söker dig som har gedigen erfarenhet inom DevOps och gärna tidigare haft en ledande roll. Du är van vid att arbeta i en komplex utvecklingsmiljö och har god förståelse för mjukvaruproduktion i större teknikintensiva organisationer.
   

  

**Vi Ser Gärna Att Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av att stötta utvecklingsmiljöer på Linux och MacOS
* Goda kunskaper i Python
* Erfarenhet av cloudtjänster och applikationer i AWS och/eller Azure
* Praktisk erfarenhet från DevOps-arbete och CI/CD
* Kunskap om REST-API kopplingar mot Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, GitLab och JIRA
* Vana av dokumentation av system, processer och konfigurationer
* Förståelse för IP-nätverk och grundläggande felsökning
* Erfarenhet av ärendehanteringssystem
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att administrera virtuella servermiljöer (VmWare)
* Ledarskap i större projekt med ansvar för team och leverans
* Förmåga att bygga och vidareutveckla effektiva arbetsgrupper


**Teknisk Kompetensnivå**
* Avancerad: Jenkins, Ansible, Bitbucket, övervakningssystem, Python, DevOps-arbetssätt
* Mellannivå: Linux, Android, FreeIPA, JIRA, VmWare, GitLab
* Placeringsort: Täby, norra Stockholm
* Omfattning: 100%, arbete sker på plats
* Startdatum: 2025-08-18
* Längd: Tillsvidare

title: Sourcing, Talent Intelligence, and Research Partner
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

**Job Description**
 The
 **Sourcing, Talent Intelligence, and Research (STAR) Partner** 
 function at Wolt plays an exciting part in the role of Talent Acquisition, as we are scaling & driving sophistication in our org design, in order to future-proof Wolt, proactively raising the talent bar as we embark on a continued journey of accelerated growth.
   

  

 The STAR team name is not just a fun acronym intended to sound catchy - it is due to our genuine goal of hiring the most awesome sourcers and researchers in the world, who know that attraction of top talent requires a whole ton more than basic InMail outreach. The STAR team won’t merely pipeline-build on behalf of recruiters, in response to immediate open hiring.
   

  

 Instead you will conduct deep, proactive research into global talent availability, bring market insights, be aware of competitor activity, understand local and international working conditions/comp & benefits, investigate diverse talent pools and more. You will inform the long-term talent attraction strategy at Wolt, bringing intricate data & insights that support the location selection of future talent hubs, while guiding geo expansion.
   

  

 Whether you are sourcing for entry level or executive talent, you will bring a scientific approach to talent identification, adopt a high-touch approach, carefully headhunting talent and offering an outstanding candidate experience, considering each and every candidate as a first class citizen.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Help to build sourcing team processes, tooling & ways of working, ensuring seamless interaction with recruiting and coordination teams for a slick candidate and stakeholder experience
* Utilize tools like TalentNeuron, LinkedIn Insights and more, to produce detailed research that informs the talent strategy for multiple roles types.
* Partner closely with your TA Partner peers, aligning on who owns what in the attraction work for shared-ownership vacancies and ensuring a joint-up approach in communicating with your shared customers
* Maintain evergreen pipelines for critical-mass roles such as product designer, product lead, data scientist
* Lead deep-dive research projects, for example finding and analysing data to inform geo-strategy for new country/city tech hubs or shared service centres
* Build mechanisms for rapid response to volatility in the market, changing direction quickly to opportunistically scoop up top talent from companies announcing slowdowns or layoffs.
* Use funnel pass-through ratios (screens to interview to assessments to offers to accepts etc) to calculate sourced volume needed at the top end of the funnel to generate high-quality hires
* Contribute to a monthly talent insights newsletter with actionable recommendations
* Support social media attraction campaigns, in partnership with the Employer Branding team, ensure prompt STAR team follow-up with ‘warm leads’ resulting from campaign activity
* Participate in ‘diversathons’ and ‘sourcathons’ with all hands on deck across TA, everyone in it together to source for the trickiest roles
* Stay up to date on the latest AI-based sourcing tools, online & offline events and other opportunities to efficiently attract passive talent
* Build a valuable talent networks & communities that Wolt can leverage for long term branding, networking, direct-sourcing and referrals
* Get creative on where to find talent for niche roles, using advanced scraping/other techniques to pull leads from multiple online and offline sources.
* Be a true talent advisor and competitor talent expert, building deep knowledge of the markets or domain expertise that you support.


**Qualifications**
* Deep expertise in either a sourcing or research/data analytics capacity (especially within Product Management, Product Design and Data Science)
* Candidates without prior talent acquisition/recruiting industry experience can be considered, providing career history and or studies include highly numerical/analytical/research-based expertise/qualifications
* Ability to translate complex data into tangible and actionable insights for partner teams and stakeholders
* Creative approach to problem-solving, ideally with demonstrable experience of identifying and attracting talent for niche roles, in other words magicking rabbits out of hats :-)
* Experience in consultative roles, requiring strong business acumen
* Top notch verbal communication, writing/presentation skills: able to collaborate with TA
* Partners in defining strategic talent plans that can be presented to senior business leaders, able to bring to life Wolt job opportunities to candidates in a compelling manner.


 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Head of Strategy and Portfolio Management
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
I'm Staffan Åkesson, CTO and Head of Infra, and I'm searching for a new colleague to join my team. Do you want to be my next co-pilot?
   

  

 As Jakob Edmark is moving to his next role within Telia Infra I am now looking for the next Head of Strategy and Portfolio Management for Infra in Sweden. Infra is responsible for Telia’s networks and digital infrastructure in Sweden including mobile and fixed networks, data centers and associated services platforms providing core connectivity services to consumers, enterprises and other operators and services providers in Sweden. Further, Infra is responsible for the wholesale business and well as the business with mission critical customers.
   

  

 In the role as Head of Strategy and Portfolio Management you will lead a relatively small but highly impactful and skilled team to ensure both short and long term development and value creation of our networks and digital infrastructure portfolio.
   

  

**Specifically, you will be responsible for:**
* Development of Infra’s strategy in collaboration with leadership team and units
* Strategy to execution for Infra through operational planning and target setting
* Investment planning in line with the strategy and financial plan for short and long term perspectives
* Key strategic initiatives and priorities in collaboration with internal and external stakeholders
* Climate and Circularity area for Infra in line with group-wide ambitions and targets
* Assurance and certification of quality, environmental and information security management across Telia Sweden


 To succeed in this role you need broad experience from the telecoms industry with understanding from the technology domains in mobile and fixed networks combined with a strong business acumen. It is an advantage if you also have experience from the specifics in the Swedish telecoms market, including legal and regulatory considerations. As an individual you have a strong strategic mindset and analytical capabilities and you are motivated by our contribution to Telia’s customers and business as well as Telia’s overall impact in society.
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 18,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We´re looking forward to your application by 05/27/2025. Please apply through our recruitment system to keep your data safe, as we can’t accept resumes via email. Required background checks will be performed. Got questions? Please reach out to our recruiter gustav.dalen@teliacompany.com.
   

  

*Telia is part of Sweden's critical infrastructure and parts of our operations are covered by legislation regarding protective security. Before employment can take place, an approved security screening is required, which, where applicable, may entail requirements for certain citizenship.*
**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: IT-säkerhetsanalytiker
job_function: Information Technology, Engineering, and Project Management
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Computer and Network Security, and Public Safety
description:
**Vi söker en erfaren IT-säkerhetsanalytiker till ett konsultuppdrag inom offentlig sektor. Start snarast möjligt, 6 mån uppdrag till att börja med.** 




  





  





 I detta uppdrag kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att leda och utveckla säkerhetsarbetet i en samhällskritisk verksamhet, där fokus ligger både på kravställning och praktiskt genomförande.
 



  





  





 Uppdraget är uppdelat i två delar: halva tiden arbetar du operativt med att leda och stärka det centrala säkerhetsarbetet, och den andra halvan fokuserar du på att stötta verksamheten i att komma igång med säkerhetsrutiner, kravställning samt arbeta hands-on med säkerhetsärenden.
 



  





  





**Ansvarsområden:** 




  




* Leda och förstärka det centrala säkerhetsarbetet på en operativ nivå
* Initiera och etablera säkerhetsrutiner och kravställning inom verksamheten
* Utforma och införa policyer, strategier och övriga säkerhetsrelaterade regelverk
* Arbeta operativt med ärenden inom informations- och IT-säkerhet
* Använda Microsoft Defender för uppföljning av SOC-relaterade uppgifter
* Bidra till både styrning och teknisk administration i säkerhetssystem



  





  





**Kvalifikationer:** 




  




* Minst fem års erfarenhet av kvalificerat arbete inom IT- och informationssäkerhet
* Hög generalistkompetens inom området och vana vid komplexa säkerhetsuppdrag
* Erfarenhet av att leda säkerhetsarbete i större grupper och samtidigt arbeta operativt
* God teknisk förståelse och förmåga att kravställa på ett strukturerat sätt
* Självgående, ansvarstagande och bekväm i en roll med hög grad av självständighet
* Flytande svenska och engelska.



  





  





 Detta är ett konsultuppdrag på 100% via Incluso i Stockholm. Start är snarast möjligt, 6 månaders tidsbegränsat uppdrag till att börja med. För detta uppdrag behöver du kunna vara minst 50% on-site i Stockholm.
 



  





  





 Vänligen sök med CV på svenska och kort motivering via länken nedan. Vi presenterar kandidater löpande.
 



  





  





 Ansvarig rekryterare på Incluso är Marianne Nilsson.

title: First Line Support Manager within eHealth
description:
Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish health and social care. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.
   

  

**The position**
 The Team Manager for first line Customer support is responsible for operating and running Cambio’s first line support. Cambio’s Customer support is our strategic touch points with our customers, and your goal is to ensure a continuous service excellence performance where we are learning from each customer interaction.
   

  

 You will be part of owning the way of working for the area, tools, and to secure an effective governance to secure high-quality and efficient deliveries from the team.
   

  

 Cambio’s primary objective is to deliver a high-quality customer experience, and your future team play a critical role in delivering against our customer contracts, needs, and expectations.
   

  

 You will report to the Head of Customer Support and you will apply improvement strategies developed in conjunction with major stakeholders from the Customer Delivery Division and deliver operational outputs to both our customers and internal stakeholders.
   

  

 This role gives you the unique opportunity to be a part of an upscaling 24/7 support function within health care industries. You will join in a time where you will take an active part in the upscaling process including recruiting your own team, defining, setting internal KPIs/PIs and managing an outsourced partner for a part of first line support.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Provide tactical and operational direction for our customer support team to continually deliver on our customer experience, cost management and SLAs.
* Maintain and improve our customer support tactical plans with focus on organization, processes and tools, and capability development.
* Maintain an active role in hiring, training, workforce planning, and supporting the team, as well as managing all day-to-day team activities
* Identify, implement, and drive continuous improvement projects within your area
* Establish and improve monitoring procedures and KPI dashboard
* Set and monitor operations to ensure adherence to schedules, work plans, and performance requirements


 At Cambio, we encourage taking initiatives that contribute to the development of the company and ourselves. For us, it is important that you should have the opportunity to grow, both as a person and as an employee. Our culture is described through the words “Trust”, “Care” and “Together” which permeate everything we do.
   

  

**About You**
 You have proven leadership experience, ideally from a customer support environment. You enjoy leading, motivating, and coaching teams. You have a passion for your team members personal development. Identifying improvements, solving problems under pressure and adapt to frequently changing work needs to motivate and drive you. You should always think about how to enhance the customer experience for continuous service excellence.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* At least 3 years of experience in a contact center management role or equivalent university degree, preferable in business and/or management.
* Proven track record in managing multiple projects, competing priorities, and deadlines
* Experience of performance management and operational work force planning management
* Solid understanding of ITIL processes, ITSM tools and good understanding of contact center tools infrastructure (including integrations)
* Analytical, able to analyze contact center reporting, and data to make decisions to support corporate, regulatory, and customer service-level goals
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both written and spoken


**It's a bonus if you**
* Experience of knowledge management and KCS
* Experience of managing larger teams


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

 At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full time
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Other:** 
 We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

 We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located and have the legal right to work in Sweden
 **.** 
 We will ask for verification during the process.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Read more about us
 **here!**
 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site
 **here!**
 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Senior SAP Data Consultant
description:
Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.
   

  

 We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.
   

  

 “Across the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.” –
 **Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO.**
**About our Nordic SAP Business Group:**
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP transformation programs with some of the biggest companies.
   

  

 Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP and SAP RISE.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking for candidates on several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**SAP Data Nordic Value Tower:**
 Within the SAP Value Tower Data, we offer you the opportunity to work with SAP Data and to grow your knowledge within the area of Information Management, connected to SAP MDG, Master Data Management and Data Migration.
   

  

 We are looking for people who have a genuine interest in Data, want to grow and challenge themselves within that area and work with the best skilled colleagues.
   

  

**Role Overview:**
 As a junior SAP Data Consultant in Accenture’s Nordic SAP Business Group, you will be an integral part of our team supporting our clients SAP transformation projects through acting as a Functional Expert in the Data Migration and/or Data Governance areas. You will work closely with clients, translating their business and functional requirements into SAP design documents and overseeing solution delivery. Your strong business process knowledge, combined with your in-depth expertise will be key to designing effective and efficient solutions for our clients.
   

  

**Example project roles:**
- Advise clients on their data transformation strategies, driving value creation through the positioning of SAP enabled solutions as well as leading solutions from SAP partners and Accenture

- Be part of the data migration stream of an S/4HANA transformation, working with colleagues in delivery centers to execute on their data transformation and data upload strategies

- Work with clients on their transformational journey, by implementing Master Data Governance strategy and processes, following SAP best practices and Accenture’s proven ways of working

**What’s in it for you:**
- Help Accenture deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity

- Be part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery

- Enjoy competitive compensation and benefits

- Develop your skills and build an extraordinary career

- Grab significant development and training opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills

- Get internal coaching, support and guidance from a mentor, to progress in your work and professional career with continuous feedback

- Gain access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert networks and benchmarks

- Combine business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how

- Transform businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies

- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects

- Play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world.

**Qualifications**
**Must have:**
- Multiple years of hands-on experience with SAP Data Migration and/or Data Governance

- Multiple years of experience with team leadership and/or project management on S/4HANA or other SAP implementation or transformation projects

- Passion about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Very good understanding of Master Data models, methods and standards

- Hands-on experience in working with SAP technologies within MDG, Data Quality, Data Management and/or Data Migration

- Experience of the full project lifecycle including estimating, planning and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Deep business & industry experience in one or more industries

- Strong resonance with Accenture’s values

- Motivation, persistence, eagerness to optimize and drive for excellence

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility and to be a team player

- Ability to effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- A Bachelor or Master’s degree

**Very nice to have:**
- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken

- An SAP certification in a relevant area

- Specific knowledge in a functional or business process area within SAP

- Deep skills in Data Transformation tools and activities

- Extensive experience with Data Quality and/or Data Cleansing tools and activities

 Locations
   

  

 Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö

title: Delivery Consultant - Machine Learning (GenAI), ProServe SDT North
description:
**Description**
 AWS Professional Services is a unique organization. Our customers are most-advanced companies in the world. We build for them world-class, -native IT solutions to solve real business problems and we help them get business outcomes with AWS. Our projects are often unique, one-of-a-kind endeavors that no one ever has done before.
   

  

 At Amazon Web Services (AWS), we are helping large enterprises build AI solutions on the AWS Cloud. We are applying predictive technology to large volumes of data and against a wide spectrum of problems. AWS Professional Services works together with AWS customers to address their business needs using AI solutions.
   

  

 As a Delivery Consultant - ML, you will innovate, (re)design and build -native, business-critical AI solutions with our customers. You will take advantage of the global scale, elasticity, automation and high-availability features of the AWS platform. You will build customer solutions with Amazon SageMaker, Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Elastic Compute (EC2), Amazon Data Pipeline, Amazon S3, Glue, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS), Amazon Elastic Map Reduce (EMR), Amazon Kinesis, AWS Lake Formation and other AWS services.
   

  

 You will collaborate across the whole AWS organization, with other consultants, customer teams and partners on proof-of-concepts, workshops and complex implementation projects. You will innovate and experiment to help Customers achieve their business outcomes and deliver production-ready solutions at global scale. You will lead projects independently but also work as a member of a larger team. Your role will be key to earning customer trust.
   

  

 As an Amazonian you will demonstrate the Amazon Leadership Principles, coaching and mentoring others on best practices, performance and career development.
   

  

 This is a customer-facing role. When appropriate and safe, you will be required to visit our office and to travel to client locations to deliver professional services when needed.
   

  

**You Will**
* Invent and build AI solutions that solve complex problems, scale globally, guarantee performance, and enable breakthrough innovations,
* Use AWS AI/ML services (e.g., Amazon Bedrock), ML platforms (SageMaker), and frameworks (e.g., MXNet, PyTorch, SparkML, scikit-learn) to help our customers build AI/ML solutions.
* Work with customers and partners, guiding them through planning, prioritization and delivery of complex transformation initiatives, while collaborating with relevant AWS Sales and Service Teams,
* Assist customers by being able to deliver a AI/data projects from beginning to end, including understanding the business need, aggregating data, exploring data, building & validating predictive models, and deploying completed models with concept-drift monitoring and retraining to deliver business impact to the organization,
* work with our other Professional Services consultants (GenAI, Big Data, IoT, HPC) to analyze, extract, normalize, and label relevant data, and with our Professional Services engineers to operationalize customers’ models after they are prototyped,
* Help customers define their business outcomes and guide their technical architecture and investments,
* Create and apply frameworks, methods, best practices and artifacts that will guide our Customers; publish and present them in large forums and across various media platforms,
* Contribute to enhancing and improving AWS services.


 Our team in AWS Professional Services provides you excellent opportunities to
   

  

* Build enterprise-scale AI solutions hands-on on AWS,
* Resolve technical challenges in AI, big data, IoT, and more,
* Overcome business challenges in different industries,
* Develop your leadership skills in Customer engagements,
* Influence AWS adoption in our regional market.


 Come and Build with us!
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* 3+ years experience in the industry as a ML practitioner with hands-on and implementation of ML systems; building, validating and deploying GenAI models
* 7+ years of professional experience in a business environment; experience of IT platform implementation in a highly technical or analytical role,
* 3+ years experience of handling large datasets and strong software development skills with proficiency in one or more programming languages including Python and one additional language e.g., Java, C#
* Strong understanding of DevOps practices with practical hands-on application and strong interest in AI/ML solutions Strong verbal and written communications skills and ability to lead effectively across organizations


**Preferred Qualifications**
* 3+ years Technical experience preferred, knowledge of AI/ML Technology stack of AWS and Generative AI trends, patterns, anti-patterns
* 3+ years Application Development experience required with serverless technologies and experience training distributed ML models on CPU and GPU hardware
* Serving ML models through realtime APIs and experience with deploying production-grade machine learning solutions on public cloud platforms
* Knowledge of vertical use cases for large language models in industries like finance, healthcare, manufacturing etc


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

title: PLM Solution Architect
description:
World leader in engineering and R&D services, Capgemini Engineering combines its broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software to support the convergence of the physical and digital worlds. Coupled with the capabilities of the rest of the Group, it helps clients to accelerate their journey towards Intelligent Industry. Capgemini Engineering has more than 55,000 engineer and scientist team members in over 30 countries across sectors including Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.
   

  

 Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of €22 billion.
   

  

 We’re looking for Senior Solution Architects with experience from Teamcenter, 3DExperience or Windchill, who can bring value to the team and work as a key resource in our PLM projects. You will act as a creator of architectural design, defining system requirements and use cases to address overall business requirements, ensuring that the technical solution remains aligned and delivers value throughout any project. Location can be in Stockholm, Gothenburg or Malmö.
   

  

**The role**
* Engage in Customer Project Delivery Activities
* Conduct requirements gathering sessions and workshops
* Analyze customer requirements and take ownership of high / low level design for PLM and other associated systems
* Propose, plan, design and communicate architectural solutions with Capgemini, Software vendor architects and customers
* Produce written specifications that align with customer requirements for proposed solution and configuration activities
* Identify issues, risks and provide input on solutions to key stakeholders
* Explain requirements, design and configuration requirements to onsite / offshore team members
* Guide team as required to ensure deliverables meet customer expectations
* Demos to key stakeholders as required during requirement gathering and in later stages for UAT etc.
* Participate in customer delivery and cutovers as needed.
* Actively contribute to Pre-Sales Activities
* Work with sales for budgetary proposals


**Your profile**
* University degree, preferably in the fields of Computer Science or Engineering
* Demonstrated expertise in developing and deploying solutions based on Teamcenter, 3DExperience or Windchill
* At least 4 years of experience working in a Nordic country
* Proven IT development experience as well as experience of multi-cultural project teams, where parts are located off-site
* Excellent communication skills in English, both orally and written
* Swedish work permit or Swedish citizenship


 Advantagous
   

  

* Swedish communication skills, both oral and written
* Past coding experience on Java, JSP, MQL, EKL, Widgets
* Knowledge of data migrations
* Working knowledge of CAD tools, PLM-CAD-ERP and other enterprise integrations


 We are looking for a team player who sees the team’s contribution as the ultimate goal. Additionally, you should be a self-going and communicative person with natural leader instincts, drive and independence.
   

  

**Our PLM team**
 Capgemini Engineering are experts within Digital Continuity. One of our main offerings within Digital Continuity is PLM (Product Lifecycle Management). Capgemini has more than 3000 PLM experts implementing and maintaining PLM solutions globally. We have strategic partnerships with the major PLM Vendors like Dassault, PTC, Siemens, and Aras. Our global footprint is huge within several different industry sectors and clients like Airbus, P&G, Dräger, Burberry, BMW, DELL, Johnson & Johnson and many more. Capgemini can offer full PLM transformations and E2E offerings, from strategy, define & develop processes, build and implement to managed services.
   

  

 With our local Nordic Digital Continuity team, we work closely with our Nordic clients and leverage all the knowledge, experiences, assets and frameworks that we have globally. This is a great opportunity and benefit for our clients. Our local Digital Continuity client base and local team is constantly growing, and we are continuously looking for new talents within Digital Continuity, PLM and closely related domains.
   

  

 In our Nordic team we are pooling experts together, creating a place where we can be inspired, inspire others, coach and be coached, and find a common ground for insights and deliveries. We want you to become a part of our team, to help us grow and let the synergies of great talent take us to new levels with our clients and with the rest of Capgemini.
   

  

 Join us and Get The Future You Want!
   

  

 Welcome with your application!
   

  

 At Capgemini Engineering we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism and innovation. We offer a job with variation that leaves plenty of room for initiative and development. In fact, we are not just offering you a job, we’re inviting you to be part of our community where we will provide you trainings, tools & grounds for professional and personal growth. Each career experience is assorted by an attractive salary package.

title: Gruppchef, Patologi
description:
På Unilabs kombinerar vi ett stort medicinskt kunnande med en stor mänsklig omtanke. Genom våra sätt att arbeta skapar vi ett tydligt kundvärde och tydligt patientvärde. Detta gör vi med hjälp av effektiv diagnostik, hög kvalitet och förstklassig kundservice mot våra patienter och kunder. Vi har gemensamt en vilja att ge de bästa förutsättningar till vård för varje enskild individ och vi tror på att våra medarbetares kompetens, drivkraft och engagemang har en stor del i det mervärdet som vi skapar för samhället i stort. VAD Som Gruppchef Patologi leder och utvecklar du arbetet för ett av våra team inom klinisk patologi. I vårt lab genomförs analyser av biologiskt material, såväl manuellt som digitalt, och som gruppchef kommer du att leda ett team som befinner sig i diagnostikens absoluta framkant. Ditt huvudfokus kommer att vara att bygga stabilitet i verksamheten genom att tillsammans med teamet driva utvecklingen av enheten i syfte att öka såväl trivsel som kapacitet och produktivitet.
   

  

 Som Gruppchef ansvarar du för ett team bestående av 15–20 personer bestående av Biomedicinska analytiker, laboranter och undersköterskor. Du rapporterar till Driftchef Patologi.
   

  

 Som gruppchef kommer du att arbeta nära dina medarbetare, du leder och fördelar arbetsuppgifter samt säkerställer att dina medarbetare har en god arbetsmiljö. Du har delegerat arbetsmiljöansvar och ansvarar även för utvecklings- och lönesamtal för dina medarbetare. Du håller i möten, avstämningar och inleder varje morgon med Daglig styrning, tillsammans med teamet. Du kan också komma att arbeta laborativt i mån av tid.
   

  

 VEM Till den här tjänsten söker vi dig som är trygg i ditt ledarskap. Du har en stark personlig drivkraft, ett öppet sinne och med förmåga att hitta nya lösningar. Vi tror att du är kommunikativ och har en hög servicekänsla samt är lyhörd inför medarbetare, patienter och kundernas behov. Du hittar även en balans mellan att vara lyhörd och att stå kvar i fattade beslut. Kvalitets- och patientsäkerhetsarbete är en självklarhet för dig. Du är van att arbeta strukturerat och har en god organisationsförmåga.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Akademisk examen exempelvis biomedicinsk analytiker, civilingenjör, apotekare eller motsvarande naturvetenskaplig examen
* Ledarerfarenhet med personalansvar
* Erfarenhet av laboratorieverksamhet, helst patologi eller annan medicinsk inriktning
* God vana att hantera moderna IT system
* Mycket god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Erfarenhet av kvalitetsarbete och dokumentation Meriterande
* Tidigare budgetansvar
* Vana av projektarbete Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med start enligt överenskommelse. Vi jobbar löpande med urval och intervjuer så skicka gärna in din ansökan omgående. Vi tillämpar provanställning. Tjänsten är placerad vid vårt fina laboratorium i Huvudsta, Solna.


 VAR Unilabs AB är idag en ledande aktör inom radiologi och laboratoriemedicin och Sveriges största privata leverantör av röntgen, mammografi och laboratoriemedicin. Vi möter våra patienter och kunder på sjukhus, närakuter, primärvårdslaboratorier, våra egna fristående röntgenenheter och mottagningar. Det är en verksamhet med full fart i en lugn omgivning med stor variation. Av våra totalt 13 000 medarbetare i Europa, arbetar drygt 1,200 i Sverige. Läs gärna mer om oss på www.Unilabs.se Unilabs erbjuder tjänster inom laboratoriemedicin och bild- och funktionsdiagnostik till öppen och sluten sjukvård. Våra tjänster kännetecknas av hög kvalitet, säkerhet och service. Unilabs har idag ca 1300 medarbetare men vi växer ständigt. De största yrkesgrupperna är biomedicinska analytiker, röntgensjuksköterskor och läkare med specialistkompetens inom radiologi eller laboratoriemedicin. Att arbeta på Unilabs innebär att förstå att vårt jobb inte bara är att producera testresultat. Vi tillhandahåller verkliga, användbara svar för våra patienter och vårdgivare. Vårt arbete förändrar livet direkt till det bättre, vilket vi ser som ett fantastiskt privilegium och något värt att arbeta för.

title: Deputy Secretary General/Head of EIB Group Permanent Representative’s Office in Brussels/Belgium
description:
The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Secretariat General Directorate (SG), located in the EIB Permanent Representative’s Office in Brussels/Belgium, a
 **Deputy Secretary General/Head of EIB Group Permanent Representative’s Office\*.**
**This is a full-time temporary position at grade 9 in** 
**Brussels/Belgium.**
**The appointment is for a term of 5 years.**
**The EIB offers fixed-term contracts of up to a maximum of 6 years, according to business needs, with a possibility to convert to a permanent contract, subject to organisational requirements and individual performance.**
* internal benchmark Directorate Head


*Assessment centres are anticipated for the second half of June 2025.*
*Panel interviews are anticipated for July 2025.*
 Purpose
   

  

 The newly created position will support the Secretary General in leading the European Investment Bank (EIB) Group’s Permanent Representative’s Office in Brussels as well as the leadership, management, coordination and supervision of the departments relating to economic analysis and EIB Group strategy. You will be based in Brussels but will be expected to split your working time between Brussels and Luxembourg. The scope of the role may evolve over time.
   

  

 You will manage staff within your own hierarchical structure, providing leadership, strategic coordination and operational alignment and ensuring continuous high-level representation of the EIB Group in Brussels, in particular fostering a continuous and timely communication flow with other EU Institutions and good alignment and impact of the EIB Group’s strategies and activities as financial arm of the European Union. You will be responsible for developing and implementing plans and strategies contributing to the EIB achieving its strategic priorities, providing direction and setting priorities for your team, fostering synergies and efficiency gains as well as identifying and achieving enhanced synergies and strategic alignment between the Departments responsible for economic analysis and EIB Group Strategy.
   

  

 Specific Post Environment
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The Secretariat General is responsible for a wide range of activities and processes related to the core decision making and strategy definition within the EIB Group and related processes, including:
   

  

* Implementing and monitoring the decision-making processes in the EIB Group, and proposing, when relevant, changes in the governance policy;
* Defining corporate and institutional strategy at EU and national levels, and providing the background economic analysis to support it (including the Group Operational Plan).
* Providing economic analysis;
* Reporting on the EIB Group’s corporate responsibility activities and managing relationships with NGOs;
* Promoting the EIB’s brand, image, priorities and activities to the public through media relations, events and publications.
* Coordinating and developing relations with EU institutions, international and development financing agencies and NGOs. It is also responsible for the local EIB Group offices inside the EU, relations towards all stakeholders and civil society.


 The Secretariat General comprises two pillars, each headed by a Deputy Secretary General at Director General level with their own clearly defined remit.
   

  

 One Pillar, The Stakeholder, Corporate And Governance Pillar, Focuses On Serving The Needs Of EIB’s Key Stakeholders - Shareholders, Governing And Control Bodies And Civil Society. This Pillar Comprises Three Departments
   

  

* the Shareholder Relations and Institutional Matters Department;
* the Regulation, Governance and Corporate Responsibilities Department; and
* the EIB Institute.


 The Second Pillar, Which Will Be Led By The Successful Applicant, Is The Economics And Strategy Pillar, Which Comprises Three Areas
   

  

* the EIB Permanent Representative’s Office in Brussels
* the Group Strategy Department; and
* the Economics Department.


 The Economics Department focuses on economic research, analysis and reporting. The Group Strategy Department’s key responsibilities relate to developing the EIB Group Operational Plan, developing and coordinating the implementation of institutional and operational strategic initiatives across the EIB Group’s Services including the coordination of efficiency-enhancing projects.
   

  

 The EIB Permanent Representative’s Office in Brussels focusses on maintaining and enhancing high-level representation between the EIB Group and stakeholders in Brussels, most specifically EU institutions, bodies and agencies, fostering strong relationships with stakeholders and partners, facilitating alignment of the EIB Group and the EU’s key strategic priorities and maintaining excellent communication between the EIB Group and the European Commission.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Lead, motivate, develop and manage staff in your own area of responsibility through the senior and middle management team, ensuring that all staff has adequate competencies, training opportunities, technical resources and technical and personal skills to achieve their objectives.
* Develop and formulate strategic orientations for the EIB Group, based on close interaction with relevant internal and external stakeholders including, in particular, Brussels based EU institutions to enhance the EIB Group’s presence and impact as the financial arm of the European Union.
* Maintain and enhance the relationship with EU Institutions in Brussels, ensuring appropriate support to the Management Committee, clear and timely internal communication and good coordination.
* Ensure that the EIB Group’s strategic priorities are efficiently developed, elaborated, articulated and implemented in alignment with policies and procedures, as well as with the EU strategic priorities and policies.
* Assume a leading role in the management of institutional relations and in high-level interactions with EIB Group stakeholders and partners, in particular with the European Commission and other EU institutions, bodies and agencies.
* Develop an overall strategy for the different business areas having regard to the overall strategy and priorities for the Secretariat General and the EIB Group and coordinate effective delivery of specific strategic projects, having regard to the governance and institutional strategy in the EIB Group enabling proper and efficient decision making.
* Ensure effective communication, cooperation and knowledge sharing between all members within own area of responsibility and the EIB services across the whole organisation.
* Establish and manage the resources and means to implement efficiently the EIB Group’s strategy throughout the directorate, ensuring efficient and accountable use of resources in the realisation of own area’s mission.
* Design, maintain and follow-up, in close coordination with the Secretary General, the appropriate organisational structure, key performance indicators and ensure the realisation of qualitative and quantitative objectives.
* Ensure that staff resources are sized, organised and used adequately and efficiently to achieve business objectives and take ownership of the overall efficiency of the used resources.
* Organise, empower, manage and lead the decision-making in critical phases of key area processes in own area and throughout the EIB Group as a whole to deliver the results and objectives of the Secretariat General in compliance with EIB policies and governance.
* Ensure appropriate delegation, control and follow-up of objectives.
* Maintain constructive relationships with the different governing bodies (both managerial - Board of Governors, Board of Directors and Management Committee, as well as control functions – the Audit Committee) in relation to the responsibilities of own area to enable the Directorate to deliver its mission.
* Represent the EIB Group externally within the network of EU institutions and bodies, International Financial Institutions and other relevant external counterparts


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in in a relevant field, including business administration, finance, economics, law, or international relations.
* In depth knowledge of the functioning of EU institutions, demonstrated through experience in high level positions in an EU institution, agency or body and /or in high-level public positions in government, ministries or public sector involving responsibilities for EU matters.
* Ten years’ experience in a managerial function with a proven record of people management and ability to motivate team members.
* Recognised experience in leading high-level positions of international multidisciplinary teams.
* Good knowledge of EIB Group’s objectives, business models and strategies, as well as the interaction with the EU budget.
* Solid understanding of finance and banking institutions.
* Solid experience in economic analysis, in strategy definition and/or policy making.
* Strategic thinking and clarity of vision, sensitivity to business and political issues, analytical skills and sound judgement.
* Personal and professional credibility, with excellent communication skills.
* Empathy, excellent interpersonal, leadership, political and diplomatic skills; and ability to manage diverging interests, conflict and ambiguity. Resilience in business and people management issues.
* Creativity, openness to innovation and ability to support and manage change.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*) with a good command of the other. Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage.


 Competencies
   

  

 Find out more about EIB core and managerial competencies here
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 The remuneration of staff hired directly at a post in a local office within the EU may be adapted to the costs of living of the respective country.
 *Please visit this* 
*page* 
*for more information on our benefits.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

 Deadline for applications:
 **3rd June 2025**

title: Senior Data Architect - Tietoevry Tech Services Sweden (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Would you like to join a community where you will work with the latest technology and where you can grow your competence in a systematic manner? Would you also like to have flexibility in your work and working hours, and do you have experience in transformation projects? Then this is the place for you!
   

  

 Tietoevry Tech Services is thrilled to embark on an exciting journey under new ownership. This change opens up new possibilities, challenges, and growth opportunities for our company and our employees. We are looking for talented people who want to join us on this exciting journey and help shape the digital landscape in the Nordics.
   

  

**When joining Tietoevry Tech Services as a Senior Data Architect:**
 In this position there are two main directions that you would utilize:
   

  

* Business to technology: In this direction, you would be working closely with customer business, IT and other stakeholders with your Tietoevry Tech Services colleagues to translate their business goals into IT architecture and finally into technical solutions utilizing cloud native tools and services.
* Technology to business: In this approach, you would bring thoughts and ideas on how our customers can benefit from cloud solutions in the best possible way.


**“Sounds interesting. So, what would be required from me?”**
* We expect you to have previous experience in design/implementation, deployment verification, migration / development application to Azure, GCP or AWS.
* Several years of experience in the traditional IT in addition to cloud.
* You should be enthusiast towards data and cloud architecture, designing and/or being a strong builder and executioner of these architectures including modelling of them.
* Communication with Swedish language is must as you would be working directly with customer stakeholders which has swedish as their company language. Also some documentation customers are having might be written in Swedish.


**It is great if you also have:**
* It really helps if you are possessing a history of successful IT consulting and architecture engagements with large-scale customers.
* Event-based / real-time architecture experience with technologies such as Kafka on Confluent.
* Hands-on experience on AI, ML, GenAI is big plus as several customers of ours have started their AI / GenAI journey.
* We provide assistance for our customers with their Data & Analytics and Roadmap development based on their Business goals (capturing As-Is state, To-be architecture and gaps) and building Transition state architecture. Experience in this kind of consulting cases is a big plus.
* Analytics domain experience on technologies such as Snowflake, Synapse, Databricks.
* Several of our customers are working with some kind of agile model like SAFe or Scrum so agile methods should be familiar to you. But if not, we have great learning capabilities also from these areas for you to master.


**Did we get you inspired?**
 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we will reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact hiring manager Mauri Tusa, mauri.tusa@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

*We perform background checks on all final candidates.*
*Tietoevry Tech Services declines calls from recruitment companies.*
 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Produktägare ServiceNow med inriktning kontrollprocesser
description:
**Arbetsförmedlingen, VO IT, Avdelningen Myndighetsgemensam It** 




  





 Vill du vara med och utveckla digitala lösningar som stärker rättssäkerheten och bidrar till ett hållbart arbetsliv? Vi söker en produktägare med erfarenhet av ServiceNow som vill leda utvecklingen av en av våra viktigaste kontrollapplikationer. Tillsammans får vi Sverige i arbete. Vill du bli en av oss?
 



  





**Sektionens/enhetens uppdrag** 




 Sektionen kontroll av arbetssökande stödjer Arbetsförmedlingens kontrolluppdrag. Genom en IT-produkt som arbetar i plattformen ServiceNow, skapas teknisk kapacitet att följa upp att arbetssökande uppfyller villkoren för ersättning. Villkoren och kontrollen syftar till att stimulera sökaktiviteten, korta tiden i arbetslöshet, underlätta för arbetsgivare att hitta arbetskraft, öka sysselsättningen och motverka felaktiga utbetalningar.
 



  





 Sektionens viktigaste uppgift är att säkerställa den tekniska förmågan för kontrollprocessen.
 



  





**Beskrivning av tjänsten** 




 Vi söker en erfaren/senior produktägare med ServiceNow-inriktning som ska ansvara för en intern kontrollprodukt. Arbetet inkluderar moment som utveckling, drift, uppföljning, förvaltning och avveckling och sker i nära samarbete med Produktansvarig och de olika utvecklingsteamen.
 



 Ledningen av det dagliga arbetet syftar till att nå den gemensamma målbilden, säkerställa säker och stabil drift, driva utveckling av applikationer, hantera prioriteringar och samarbeta nära med olika verksamhetsområden och intressenter.
 



  





 För att trivas och lyckas i rollen som agil teamledare bör du vara en driven person som kan kombinera självständigt arbete med förmågan att leda och engagera andra. Du har lätt för att sätta dig in i nya processer och arbetssätt, samtidigt som du kan behålla överblicken och det strategiska perspektivet. Din kommunikativa förmåga, både i tal och skrift, kommer vara avgörande för att lyckas i rollen, då du blir en central punkt i koordineringen mellan utvecklingsteamen och verksamheten.
 



  





**Följande uppgifter kommer att vara del i ditt dagliga arbete:** 



* Planera arbete enligt det agila ramverket, vilket innefattar att hålla i och säkerställa att viktiga agila ceremonier genomförs, som dagliga standups, sprintplanering, sprintgranskning och retrospektiv. Omvärldsbevakning inom sakområdet.
* Ansvar för anpassning av applikationer utifrån lagar, regler och förordningar samt att tillse att utvecklingsinitiativ sker enligt arbetsförmedlingens designprinciper och riktlinjer.
* Ansvar för anpassning mot standardiserade processer och operativ uppföljning (incident, problem, change, release, configuration samt åtgärdande av uppkomna fel).
* Kommunikation med interna och externa samarbetspartners, utvecklingstemaen, användare och intressenter.
* Ansvar för samplanering med andra produktägare och applikationer med relaterade arbetsflöden, samt vara ett stöd till utvecklare och medverka till en produktiv och välmående arbetsmiljö.



  





**Vårt erbjudande** 




 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid som kan komma att inledas med sex månaders provanställning. Placeringsorten är Solna.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att arbeta på en arbetsplats där vi värdesätter balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Du får tillgång till ett generöst semesteravtal, flexibla arbetstider samt möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till 49 procent på årsbasis. Hos oss ingår även friskvård under arbetstid och ett förmånligt friskvårdsbidrag.
 



  






 Mer om att jobba hos oss
 




  





**Grundläggande krav för tjänsten** 



* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet i en liknande roll med agil teknisk produktutveckling med inriktning ServiceNow.
* Relevant eftergymnasial teknisk utbildning inom exempelvis datateknik, systemvetenskap eller annan utbildning som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig.
* Erfarenhet av operativt applikationsansvar inklusive utveckling, drift, uppföljning, förvaltning och avveckling.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.



**Övriga meriter för tjänsten** 



* Erfarenhet av hantering av kontrollprocesser.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i SAFe metodologi med agila utvecklingståg, SCRUM och Jira.
* Erfarenhet av projektledning, tekniska workshops och lösningsorienterat tvärfunktionellt samarbete.
* Erfarenhet av arbete inom statlig myndighet.



  





 Den statliga värdegrunden guidar oss i vårt dagliga arbete. Som anställd hos oss förväntas du arbeta rättvist, opartiskt och med hög integritet, samt bidra till att upprätthålla och stärka förtroendet för vår myndighet.
 



  






 Mer om statliga värdegrunden
 




  





 Utöver dessa kvalifikationer har du personlig förmåga och fallenhet att arbeta i enlighet med Arbetsförmedlingens medarbetarskap och chefskap:
 



 Medarbetare på Arbetsförmedlingen:
 


* **Tar ansvar** 
 för sina arbetsprestationer och sitt bidrag till helheten
* **Anpassar sig** 
 till förändring och oförutsedda händelser
* **Tar initiativ** 
 till utveckling och bidrar till förbättring



  





**Ansökan** 




 Låter det här som en tjänst för dig? Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2025 - 05 - 27.
 



 Bifoga ditt CV där du specificerar årtal, månad och arbetsuppgifter för varje anställning, samt intyg som styrker kraven om utbildning och/eller arbetslivserfarenhet i din ansökan.
 




  





 Det är viktigt att du besvarar urvalsfrågorna detaljerat och sanningsenligt, för att vi ska få en tydlig bild av din erfarenhet. Om efterfrågad information inte framgår riskerar du bli bortsållad i urvalet. Du behöver inte skicka in ett personligt brev.
 



  





 Under rekryteringsprocessen kan urvalstester förekomma. Vi kommer att hålla dig informerad genom hela rekryteringsprocessen.
 
 Mer om vår rekryteringsprocess.
 




  





 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontaktar du den rekryteringspartner som finns namngiven i annonsen så får du hjälp med att skicka in din ansökan.
 



  





 Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering. Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande. Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.
 



  





**Välkommen till jobbet som får Sverige i arbete! Här arbetar du på regeringens uppdrag för en arbetsmarknad som hjälper människor framåt. Vi frigör möjligheter så att arbetssökande hittar sysselsättning och arbetsgivare sin nästa medarbetare. För att nå målet behöver vi samarbeta, i myndigheten men också med olika externa aktörer i hela landet. Tillsammans driver vi förändring, utvecklar nya arbetssätt och skapar lösningar som gör att Sverige kan fortsätta framåt.** 




  





 Mer om vår organisation och vårt uppdrag.

title: Senior Salesforce Consultant
description:
**What We Are Looking For** 




  




* You should be the person that can show potential customers how a Salesforce solution can unleash the customers full potential in CPQ, Sales or Service Cloud.
* A senior Salesforce consultant with 5+ years experience
* You will have a strong track record of delivering Salesforce solutions at your customers and therefore have a great reputation with them. This reputation will have allowed you to expand your offering with them.
* An excellent business developer, someone who understands how to build relationships with clients and create new opportunities in Sweden.
* Someone who can attract top Salesforce talent to Monfido.
* A proactive business builder, who has the drive and personality to help Monfido grow.
* Fluency in Swedish



  





  





**What We Will Offer** 




  




* The opportunity to join a new Salesforce consulting company, where you will have the mandate to lead Monfido on their growth journey.
* To leverage your experience into an environment where you have the possibility to shape your own role and target model.
* You will have a clear growth target in relation to new business creation and talent attraction.
* A challenging and international business environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field.
* To be part of an alliance of ten consulting companies, that employ approximately 260 consultants. Within Newground Alliance, you will have the opportunity to collaborate and work with other the companies and their colleagues



  





  





**Who Is Monfido** 




  





 We are a new player on the market aiming to change the way Salesforce projects are done. With our background in the industry, we have seen many examples of what works, and more importantly, what doesn’t work. We love Salesforce, but we also know it can be confusing – and that once they’ve bought it, many companies simply don’t know how to realise value from it.
 



  





 We aim to change that.
 



  





 By bringing people and processes together, we work to ensure consistency, compliance, and scalability for our customers. We know businesses can get more from Salesforce. We’re the people who can make it happen.
 



  





 Monfido is part of Newground Alliance, a group of independent, multi-sector specialist consultancies. We put tasks and people before process and structure, and simplicity before ego.
 



 That’s consulting done right
 



  





 We are obsessed with creating value for our clients – we will radically simplify everything that gets in the way of achieving this goal. Because it’s only by asking the right questions that we can find better answers.

title: Media Strategist
company_industry: Advertising Services, Marketing Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**About GroupM**
 GroupM is WPP’s media investment group and the world’s leading media investment company with a mission to shape the next era of media where advertising works better for people. The company is responsible for more than $60 billion in annual media investment, as measured by the independent research bureau COMvergence. Through its global agencies Mindshare, Wavemaker, EssenceMediacom, and T&Pm, and cross-channel performance (GroupM Nexus), data (Choreograph), entertainment (GroupM Motion Entertainment) and investment solutions, GroupM leverages a unique combination of global scale, expertise, and innovation to generate sustained value for clients wherever they do business. Discover more at www.groupm.com.
   

  

**About Mindshare: A Leading GroupM Brand**
 Mindshare delivers Good Growth for its clients. As “Growth Architects," we drive growth that benefits all stakeholders — better for people, planet, and business — by using media with intention. This approach creates more meaningful connections with consumers, increases consumer trust in the brand, and delivers better outcomes for all stakeholders.
   

  

**Role Summary And Impact**
 Are TRPs, CPCs, VTS and aCPMs part of your everyday vocabulary?
   

  

 Do you enjoy comparing attention metrics and audience data to decide between a print ad or an influencer collaboration? Do you feel equally comfortable using How Brands Grow and Google Analytics to build and explain media strategy? Then this might be the role for you.
   

  

 As a Media Strategist at Mindshare, you’ll help shape media campaigns based on audience insights, channel knowledge, data, set KPIs, previous learnings, and strategic goals. You work closely with clients, Client Leads, and our in-house specialists to ensure our campaigns are continuously optimized and deliver real business value.
   

  

 We believe a great Media Strategist is naturally curious and stays up to date with the latest trends, formats, and platforms. You're excited about the opportunity to guide others, supporting the growth of junior team members and helping clients understand the evolving role of media.
   

  

 You bring a holistic view of media planning and understand how different channels work together to meet client objectives. In your role, you’ll collaborate with Media Managers, Media Executives, and specialists across disciplines. You’ll also be responsible for crafting briefs to ensure we get the best possible output from our specialist teams.
   

  

**Skills And Experience**
 At GroupM, we believe in the power of our culture and our people. It’s what elevates us to deliver exceptional experiences for both our clients and each other. In this role it will be critical to embrace WPP & GroupM’s shared core values:
   

  

* Be Extraordinary by Leading Collectively to Inspire transformational Creativity.
* Create an Open environment by Balancing People and Client Experiences by Cultivating Trust.
* Lead Optimistically by Championing Growth and Development to Mobilize the Enterprise.


**What we’re looking for — and what you might bring**
 We’re looking for someone who’s passionate about media, strategy, and creating impact. You don’t have to tick every single box, but here are some things that might describe you:
   

  

* You follow trends in marketing, media, data, and technology — and you’re curious to keep learning.
* You enjoy working collaboratively and believe the best ideas come from diverse teams.
* You take a creative and strategic approach to problem-solving, always with the client’s goals in mind.
* You understand how different media channels work together to create results, and you’re comfortable connecting media strategy to KPIs and business outcomes.
* You’re hands-on when needed and have an eye for both detail and the bigger picture.
* You’re comfortable in a dynamic, fast-moving environment and like to take initiative.
* You value an international work culture and are fluent in Swedish and English, both written and spoken.


 Your background might include:
   

  

* Around 5 years of experience working with media strategy - from an agency, media owner, or client side.
* A solid understanding of the digital media landscape, and ideally, experience across other media types too.
* Experience presenting ideas and recommendations to different stakeholders.
* A degree in marketing, economics, communications, or similar — or equivalent experience.


**Life At GroupM & Benefits**
 Our passion for shaping the next era of media includes investing in our employees to help them do their best work. GroupM employees can tap into the global GroupM & WPP networks to pursue their passions, grow their networks, and learn at the cutting edge of marketing and advertising. We host regular team activities, knowledge-sharing sessions, and wellness initiatives throughout the year.
   

  

 In Sweden, our benefits include wellness allowance, occupational pension, health insurance, and generous vacation policies. We recognize local public holidays and offer flexible working conditions, including hybrid work models.
   

  

 GroupM is an equal opportunity employer and considers applicants for all positions without discrimination or regard to particular characteristics. We are committed to fostering a culture of respect in which everyone feels they belong and has the same opportunities to progress in their careers.
   

  

 We believe the best work happens when we're together, fostering creativity, collaboration, and connection. That's why we’ve adopted a hybrid approach, with teams in the office around four days a week. If you require accommodations or flexibility, please discuss this with the hiring team during the interview process.
   

  

**Application**
 This is a full-time permanent position with a start date as soon as possible. We apply a six-month probationary period.
   

  

 In addition to reviewing your CV and conducting interviews, our recruitment process includes a testing phase. Selection and interviews are ongoing, so please submit your application with your CV and cover letter as soon as possible.
   

  

 We believe that diverse perspectives make us stronger and encourage applications from people of all genders, backgrounds, and experiences.
   

  

 requisitionid:20454

title: Interim - Chef inom data & insikt
description:
**Vill du leda uppbyggnaden av en ny enhet inom data och insikt och bidra till viktiga samhällsflöden?**
 För detta konsult / interimsuppdrag söker vi en erfaren chef inom data och insikt för ett längre konsultuppdrag hos en samhällsviktig aktör inom infrasktruktur och logistik.
   

  

**Ditt anställningserbjudande**
 Här får du en nyckelroll i att bygga upp en ny funktion från grunden och vara med och forma hur data används som beslutsstöd i en komplex verksamhet. Uppdraget innebär att arbeta nära ledningen och driva arbetet med ickefinansiell data kopplad till exempelvis kundnöjdhet och logistikflöden. Du blir en central spelare i att skapa struktur, tydlighet och kvalitet i hur data samlas in, analyseras och presenteras – allt med hjälp av Power BI som verktyg.
