title: Service Reliability Engineer
description:
**Assignment Description: Service Reliability Engineer (SRE)**


An experienced Service Reliability Engineer is sought to support operational processes and ensure high system reliability and availability for services running 24/7. The role focuses on maintaining operational excellence and collaborating closely with DevOps teams to drive continuous improvements and support end-to-end service lifecycle ownership.

**Role Overview:**


In this position, you will play a key part in maintaining robust operations by overseeing support processes and responding to incidents, problems, and events. You will work within a team that bridges the gap between service operation and development, ensuring that operational standards are met and improved over time. Participation in a rotational OnCall schedule is expected, approximately every 5–6 weeks.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide operational support for highly available services
* Manage and improve processes related to incident, problem, and event handling
* Collaborate with DevOps teams to drive service reliability and performance
* Support and implement proactive operational improvements
* Contribute to documentation and knowledge sharing across teams

**Profile:**


You are a proactive problem solver with a strong sense of responsibility and a collaborative mindset. You adapt well to change, are technically curious, and value innovation and reliability. Your ability to communicate effectively and foster teamwork is key to your success in this role.

**Required Skills:**

* Proven experience in service operations for 24x7 environments
* Solid understanding of ITIL processes (incident, problem, event management)
* Background in customer support roles
* Excellent communication skills in English, both spoken and written

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Familiarity with agile methodologies
* Hands-on experience with AWS or similar cloud platforms
* Skills in scripting and automation
* Experience with observability tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Grafana, Datadog)

**Additional Information:**


Work is performed in a collaborative environment with modern tools and a strong focus on flexibility and cloud technologies. There is a continuous integration and delivery setup in place, following DevSecOps and SAFe principles. The team emphasizes scalability, stability, and innovation.

**About** **Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting is a specialized staffing and recruitment firm focused on the IT sector. We collaborate with leading tech companies and innovative startups to provide exciting career opportunities for individuals passionate about digital development. With our deep technical expertise and extensive network, we efficiently match the right talents with the right assignments. At Rasulson Consulting, you’ll receive personalized guidance, regular feedback, and the chance to take the next step in your IT career.

title: DevOps Engineer & Azure Cloud
description:
**Uppdrag: DevOps Engineer med fokus på Azure Cloud**


En DevOps Engineer med djup teknisk kompetens inom Azure och moderna DevSecOps-principer sökes för ett konsultuppdrag i en teknikintensiv miljö. Du kommer att bidra till att effektivisera och automatisera utvecklings- och driftsflöden, med målet att säkerställa en stabil, säker och skalbar infrastruktur.

**Arbetsuppgifter:**

* Utveckla och förvalta CI/CD-pipelines enligt branschens bästa praxis
* Etablera och förbättra DevSecOps-arbetsflöden
* Automatisera driftsättningar och hantera molninfrastruktur i Azure
* Säkerställa optimerad prestanda och hög säkerhet i molnbaserade lösningar
* Arbeta nära utvecklingsteamen för att integrera och förbättra leveransprocesser
* Identifiera, felsöka och åtgärda tekniska problem inom infrastrukturen


Rollen kombinerar operativa och strategiska moment, vilket innebär att du behöver trivas både med praktiskt tekniskt arbete och övergripande processförbättringar. Du förväntas vara en nyckelperson i att stärka utvecklingsteamens leveranskapacitet.

**Kravprofil:**

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Azure Cloud och dess ekosystem
* Gedigen förståelse för DevSecOps och automatiserade säkerhetsflöden
* Van att arbeta med verktyg som Terraform, Ansible eller motsvarande
* Fördjupade kunskaper inom CI/CD och erfarenhet av verktyg såsom Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitLab CI eller liknande
* Praktisk erfarenhet av containerteknik och orkestrering (Docker, Kubernetes)
* Goda färdigheter i skript- och programmeringsspråk som Python, Bash eller PowerShell
* Vana vid att arbeta i agila, tvärfunktionella teammiljöer

**Meriterande:**

* Certifiering inom Azure, t.ex. Azure DevOps Engineer Expert
* Kunskap om andra molnplattformar såsom AWS eller Google Cloud
* Förståelse för säkerhetslösningar kopplade till molninfrastruktur

**Personliga egenskaper:**


Vi söker dig som är engagerad, lösningsorienterad och prestigelös. Du har ett starkt teknikintresse och drivs av att förbättra processer. Samarbetsförmåga och kommunikation är viktiga delar av rollen, liksom förmågan att självständigt ta ansvar. Du behöver kunna uttrycka dig obehindrat på både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.

**Omfattning:**

* **Period:** 19 maj 2025 – 31 december 2025
* **Plats:** Stockholm
* **Distansarbete:** Upp till 25 %

**Ansökan:**


Vid intresse, skicka in:

* Uppdaterat CV
* Önskat timpris (inkl. samtliga omkostnader)
* Tillgänglighetsdatum
* En motivering till varför just du är rätt för uppdraget, med hänvisning till tidigare roller, uppdrag eller utbildning


Observera att urval och intervjuer sker löpande. Uppdraget kan komma att stängas före utsatt datum.

**Om Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: We are looking for a Customer Onboarding Technician!
description:
*We are looking for you who want to make a difference and want to help us*  

*build a safer digital society! If you share our passion in cyber*  

*security, and want to work in an organization that encourages innovation*  

*we hope this opportunity might be the one for you!*

**About the job**


We are looking for a Customer Onboarding Technician to further strengthen the Onboarding team within our Cyber Security Operation Center (CSOC).


As a Customer Onboarding Technician, you will participate in projects for activating Managed Security Services purchased by our Customers. You will ensure that both Customer-, Orange Cyberdefense-, Vendor environments/platforms are setup in accordance with pre-defined project plans, associated instructions, and defined timeline. You are driven and take responsibility in continuous improvement and knowledge sharing activities. You will have the opportunity to collaborate cross-functionally with colleagues in the Orange Cyberdefense organization as there are various roles that collaborate within one Onboarding project.


Some of the more hands-on job tasks will be:

* Accomplish project objectives by executing project activities.
* Provide input to the Project Manager for assigned activities.
* Deliver according to the project plan, associated instructions, and the timeline.
* Ensure dependencies for the appointed activities are resolved by following up/collaborating with other project members.
* Ensure high Customer satisfaction and actively participate in Customer meetings.

**Who are you?**

* Previous experience working in a Managed Security Service organization is an advantage.
* Knowledge of keyMDR platforms, particularly Microsoft Sentinel and Microsoft Defender.
* Highly organized/structured, follow-through on commitments and with a strong sense of responsibility for your own- and the team’s overall performance.
* Ability to work and communicate effectively in English (both written and spoken) and with excellent Customer communication skills.
* You have a positive and helpful attitude in everything you do and always strive to leave a good impression on the people you meet.
* Able to remain calm and focused in potentially stressful situations.
* Solution oriented and leaves nothing to chance, to stay ahead of potential challenges.
* Curious and not afraid of asking questions or initiating discussions.
* Good understanding of Azure and tools like Azure DevOps.


Below Certifications/Experience is an advantage:

* Hands-on experience with Microsoft Defender and/or Microsoft Sentinel
* Experience from working with JIRA Software from Atlassian.
* Certifications: SC-900, SC-200, CompTia sec+ or BLT 1

**Why us?**

* Opportunity to work with market leading technology in combination with some of the industry’s most talented experts
* Flexible work environment
* We will provide you with opportunities of development, both within your professional role but also the opportunity to develop within the organization where only your ambitions set the limit!
* A challenger culture that encourages you to be self-driven and curious

**The story of Orange Cyberdefense**


Orange Cyberdefense is Sweden’s leading company in cyber security. Our vision is to contribute to a safer digital society by fighting different kinds of cybercrimes. We have about 2700 employees worldwide and 390 in Sweden. We offer our customers services within Anticipate, Identity, Protect, Detect and Respond.


At Orange Cyberdefense, we are all different but with the same passion; and that is our greatest strength. We are proud of our individual differences, experiences and histories and are convinced that we must include everyone to offer solutions that protect everyone. That is why we always make sure to treat all applications equally.

**How to join us**


Join us by sending your application through our application form. The selection is ongoing, and the position can be filled before the last application date. If you have any questions, you are very welcome to contact responsible recruiter Amanda Wennström (amanda.wennstrom@orangecyberdefense.com).

We have about 2700 employees worldwide and 390 in Sweden. We offer our customers services within Anticipate, Identity, Protect, Detect and Respond.


At Orange Cyberdefense, we are all different but with the same passion; and that is our greatest strength. We are proud of our individual differences, experiences and histories and are convinced that we must include everyone to offer solutions that protect everyone. That is why we always make sure to treat all applications equally.

**How to join us**


Join us by sending your application through our application form. The selection is ongoing, and the position can be filled before the last application date. If you have any questions, you are very welcome to contact responsible recruiter Amanda Wennström (amanda.wennstrom@orangecyberdefense.com).

As a Customer Onboarding Technician, you will participate in projects for activating Managed Security Services purchased by our Customers. title: Data & Analytics lead, Auctionet
description:
Auctionet is a marketplace where auction houses from Sweden, the UK, Finland, Spain, Germany, and Denmark sell furniture, art, design items, collectibles, and more. We are now in search of a **Data & Analytics lead** at Auctionet.

### **About the Data & Analytics Role at Auctionet**


You will play a critical role in defining and building Auctionet’s approach to data, analytics, and business intelligence from the ground up. As the key driver of our data strategy, you’ll work closely with teams across the company to inform decision-making, identify opportunities, and uncover actionable insights that accelerate our marketplace business in Sweden and throughout Europe.

### **Our data stack**


Our current (ever evolving) data stack that was built up during the last year includes

* **Postgres** as database
* **dbt** for transformation
* **Sling** and **dlt** for ingestion
* **Dagster** for orchestration
* **Metabase** for BI
  


Everything self-hosted in our Kubernetes based private cloud, maintained by our excellent DevOps team. Meaning we get a lot of the ease of cloud, without the cost monitoring.

### **Key Responsibilities: Data Strategy, Leadership, Business Intelligence**

* Develop and execute Auctionet’s comprehensive data and analytics strategy in line with company objectives.
* Partner with executive leadership, product, technology, marketing, and operations teams to embed a data-driven culture that supports Auctionet’s ambitious growth plans.
* Build and lead a best-in-class data & analytics team, fostering continuous learning and innovation.
* Drive design and implementation of scalable, trusted, and secure data architecture and business intelligence platforms.
* Establish frameworks and KPI dashboards to measure business performance and deliver regular insights to all key stakeholders.
* Enable proactive, predictive analytics and data modelling to identify trends and inform future decision-making.
* Advise on data integration and automation to streamline workflows and enhance efficiency across Auctionet’s marketplace.
* Champion a culture of experimentation, curiosity, and knowledge sharing across the organisation.

### 

### **About You: Data Leadership, Analytical Excellence, Visionary Thinking**

* Proven experience leading data and analytics teams in high-growth, digital or marketplace environments.
* Strong knowledge of data architecture, cloud data platforms, business intelligence tools, and analytics methodologies.
* Skilled at translating business needs into actionable data solutions, with a pragmatic and commercial approach.
* Exceptional analytical, problem-solving, and storytelling skills, with the ability to influence at all levels.
* Demonstrated ability to foster cross-functional collaboration and drive cultural change towards data-driven thinking.
* Strong project management skills and a passion for innovation and continuous improvement.
* Experience in the auction, e-commerce, or classified marketplace sector is a plus, but not required.
* Full professional proficiency in English is required; knowledge of Swedish or other European languages is a bonus.

### 

### **Our Recruitment Process**


We have a straightforward process without unpleasant surprises. We'll start of with a short interview and greet just to get a feeling if we could be right for each other or not. We then have a few meetings (usually two or three) where we talk about you, the role and Auctionet - and you get the chance to talk to the people you will work closely with.


In the process, we will also ask you to do a small take-home exercise. And in the end, we hope it feels like the perfect fit for both of us!

##### **Application Details**


We will be reviewing applications continuously, but please submit your application no later than 2025-05-30.


Please note this role needs to be **based in Stockholm**, we will **only consider current residents in Sweden**. Although the role is in Stockholm, we do offer Hybrid work, ie you can work from home if you prefer, for part of your time.

### **About the Team**


Currently the Data Team consist of only one person, which this role will be replacing. As a new department in Auctionet, established less than a year ago, we see great potential for this role and function within the company, and expect it to grow over time. The data team is part of the Technology department at Auctionet, which consists of 24 people, and works closely with developers and devops to design, develop and maintain the data stack.


Auctionet has around 170 employees and is the parent company of a wider group with approximately 400 colleagues across multiple countries.

### **Who We Are**


Auctionet was founded in 2011 by a team of people with unique experience of online auctions. Read more about Auctionet here. In 2021 Auctionet acquired the auction house Stockholms Auktionsverk, and we are now by far the largest auction marketplace in the Nordics, and one of the larger auction marketplaces in the world. With this acquisition, Auctionet owns and operates both the oldest auction house in the world (1674) and the second oldest (1681), which means we have been working with sustainability for 350(!) years.


Join us in our vision to make valued objects accessible for everyone, from everywhere!

title: Sr DevOps Engineer
description:
**This is Worldline** 




 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
 



  





**The Opportunity** 




 At Worldline, delivering a fantastic payment experience that our customers love is what we burn for. Our cloud-native acquiring platform is processing billions of card transactions including authorization processing and clearing and settlement for our customers to trust. Currently, we are looking for a skilled product oriented DevOps engineer.
 



  





**Day-to-Day Responsibilities​** 




 Our autonomous teams work with a lean product focused DevOps culture that continuously delivers true outcome, and if you build it, you run it! This means that you are responsible for:
 


* Active participation and contribution in all phases of the product lifecycle including discovery, delivery and operations.
* Delivering your team’s committed objectives, adapting to whatever is needed to reach the goal you and your team have committed yourselves to reach.
* Securing an outstanding qualitative service availability.



  





 You love identifying the outcomes to be achieved together with your team, our customers, our internal users, other stakeholders and suppliers to deliver a truly outstanding acquiring processing experience for our customer and our business to love.
 



  





**What makes you stand out** 



* You have previous experience from the card-payment industry, preferably focused on customer onboarding and customer portals.
* Are skilled in AWS and micro-services.
* Are passionate about delivering a payment acquiring experience that brings value for our customers and our business.
* Highly collaborative, setting your team first while also successfully collaborating with others.
* A role model for your team and others by paying attention to commitment, accountability and the true outcome for yourself, your team, our customers and internal users.
* Are comfortable in a fast-moving and agile culture - handling many different stakeholders, prioritizations and fast decisions is not an issue for you.



  





**Who Are We Looking For** 




 People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. You also:
 


* Have confirmed experience in software development and coding in various languages including Java, Python, JS, and SQL etc.
* Background in micro-services, high availability containerized service architecture and design running on AWS distributed over several availability zones and regions.
* As a result, we would like you also to have proficient knowledge in
* GCP and/or AWS cloud services including ESC, RDS, Terraform, CloudFormation
* Jenkins Pipeline and GIT, CI/CD, Release on Demand
* Docker
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, engineering or other meaningful field
* Deepened knowledge of software architecture and design including information security and experience from high-available API platforms is
* A deep understanding of software quality assurance principles
* Fluency in English



  





**Skills we’d like** 



* Experience from DevOps ways of working and lean culture
* Paying attention to commitment, accountability and result for yourself and for your team.
* Experience from developing secure and/or PCI-DSS certified solutions is considered an advantage. As well as GDPR regulated solutions.
* Good communication and presentation abilities
* Challenging status quo
* Having a technical and curious mindset, continuously learning and sharing your knowledge with your peers and others.



  





**Perks & Benefits** 




 At Worldline, you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
 


* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2:nd year
* Private Health Care Insurance (EuroAccident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.



  





**Shape the evolution** 




 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
 



  





**Learn more about life at Worldline at jobs.worldline.com** 




  





**We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.**

title: DevOps Teamlead
description:
**Rollen:**
 Den person vi söker skall förutom att arbeta som DevOps även vara Teamlead för DevOps teamet. Det innebär att att planera upp och driva arbetet i gruppen, kommunicera med olika stakeholders. Teamet har sedan även en hel del ansvar för den interna driften av systemen.
   

  

**Vi ser gärna att du har dokumenterad kunskap inom:**
* Support av Linux och MacOS klienter och servrar i en utvecklingsmiljö
* Skriptspråket Python
* Utveckling och support av cloudbaserade tjänster och applikationer (AWS och/eller Azure)
* Arbete i en DevOps-miljö
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av ”Continuous integration & continuous deployment, delivery methods and techniques”
* REST-API mot Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, GitLab, JIRA
* Dokumentering av system, processer, konfigurationer och andra instruktioner
* Hur ett IP nätverk fungerar, samt grundläggande felsökning av dessa

**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Ort:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Period** 
 : 18-08-2025-Tillsvidare

*Vi presenterar löpande. Om du är intresserad av ett uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.*

title: CloudOps Engineer
description:
CONSULTING it söker en Cloud Operations Engineer till ett uppdrag hos ett globalt, kreativt och tekniskt framstående detaljhandelsbolag i centrala Stockholm. Här får du jobba i en högpresterande och föränderlig miljö där nätverk och moln står i centrum.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som Cloud Operations Engineer kommer du att ingå i ett tekniskt kompetent team som driver driften och vidareutvecklingen av en modern Azure-baserad infrastruktur. Företaget har en tydlig Cloud First-strategi, där nästan hela miljön är i Azure med vissa kvarvarande on-prem-resurser vilket ger dig en bred, hybrid miljö att arbeta i.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta med allt från Azure Virtual Network-design och felsökning, till automatisering med PowerShell och Azure CLI samt daglig drift av Windows-baserade serversystem. Rollen passar dig som vill ha en varierad vardag där nätverk och molninfrastruktur är i fokus.
   

  

**Tekniska fokusområden:**
* Nätverk i Azure
* Design, konfiguration och felsökning av Azure Virtual Networks, subnets, NSG, UDR och routing
* Arbeta med hela TCP/IP-stacken (lager 1–4): IP-routing, portar, DNS, VPN, brandväggsregler
* Azure Infrastructure
* Drift och vidareutveckling av en molntung Azure-miljö
* Arbeta med VPN Gateways, Bastion, peering, hybridkopplingar
* Automatisera uppgifter via PowerShell, Azure CLI och DevOps pipelines
* Medverka i projektarbete och backloghantering via Azure DevOps
* Windows Servermiljöer
* Underhåll och konfiguration av Windows Server-system, både i molnet och lokalt
* Hantering av Active Directory, GPO, DNS och DHCP
* Integration mellan servrar och nätverksresurser


**Övriga uppgifter:**
* Incidenthantering och ärendehantering i ServiceNow
* Övervakning via Azure Monitor och Log Analytics
* Dokumentation och kontinuerligt förbättringsarbete inom drift och nätverk


**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet inom IT-drift, nätverk eller molninfrastruktur
* Stark kompetens inom TCP/IP, DNS, routing och nätverkssäkerhet
* God vana att arbeta i Azure-miljöer
* Erfarenhet av Windows Server, Active Directory, GPO
* Förmåga att felsöka, dokumentera och kommunicera lösningar
* Bekväm med verktyg som Azure DevOps och ServiceNow


**Meriterande:**
* Certifieringar som AZ-104, AZ-700, CCNA
* Erfarenhet av hybridmiljöer och VPN-kopplingar
* Kunskap inom Infrastructure as Code (Terraform eller Bicep)
* Förståelse för säkerhetsprinciper som Zero Trust och nätverkssegmentering


**Om CONSULTING it:**
 När du börjar hos oss som konsult på CONSULTING it blir du en del av vår gemenskap. Du får dessutom kollegor runt om i Sverige! Du har en dedikerad konsultchef som stöttar dig och din utveckling. Vi hjälper dig hitta nya vägar genom att prova på nya roller och nya branscher, för oss är det viktigt att du trivs på din arbetsplats. Vi ser till att du hamnar på ett bra bolag under ditt uppdrag och att uppdragen ligger i linje med hur du vill utvecklas framöver. Oavsett vad det blir, står vi bakom dig hela vägen – i ditt nästa, nästa och nästa steg. Gå med i vårt team och ta del av en spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö!

description:

**Rollen:**
 Den person vi söker skall förutom att arbeta som DevOps även vara Teamlead för DevOps teamet. Det innebär att att planera upp och driva arbetet i gruppen, kommunicera med olika stakeholders. Teamet har sedan även en hel del ansvar för den interna driften av systemen.
